member.name: M:MyBackendProject.Controllers.DogController.GetRandomDog
member.summary: This endpoint gets a random dog

member.name: M:MyBackendProject.Controllers.DogController.GetBreed(System.String)
member.summary: This endpoint gets an array of breeds containing the search keyword
member.param: The breed to search for. Can enter part of the name
member.returns: An array of breeds which match the query parameter passed in. Each element of the array represents a breed and contains information about the breed

member.name: M:MyBackendProject.Controllers.DogController.postVote(MyBackendProject.Models.Vote)
member.summary: Sends an object in the body containing the "image_id" you want to Vote on, and "value":1 to Up Vote, or "value":0 to Down Vote

member.name: M:MyBackendProject.Controllers.DogController.GetById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a specified vote by id
member.param: Id of the vote to search for

member.name: M:MyBackendProject.Controllers.DogController.DeleteVoteById(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a vote specified by the input id
member.param: Id of the vote to delete
